data.actual_result: The same text (or more text) appears in both channels.
data.expected_result: The text should only be shown in the first channel and not in both.
data.short_description: [iPad only] Same draft text appears in a second channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure your iPad is in landscape mode - Go to any text channel (e.g. #test) - Start writing a text - While writing the text switch to a different (it is important that this happens while still typing text) channel by clicking on any channel in the channel list (e.g. #test-2) - Switch back to the first channel (#test) - Open the second channel again (#test-2)
